troubleshooting.dependency_issues: Run 'uv sync' to ensure all dependencies are installed
troubleshooting.type_errors: Review type annotations and ensure pyright configuration is correct
troubleshooting.formatting_issues: Run 'uv run ruff format' to fix formatting automatically

recommendations: Regular pre-commit hook execution to maintain code quality
Periodic dependency updates for security and performance
Monitor test coverage and add tests for uncovered code
Review and update type annotations for better code safety
